Tour of the French Riviera from Monaco to Cannes, 21 April 2003

---Casino is on right.---
---Entrance to the casino. Ten euros are required per person to even enter.---
---Ferrari parked in front of casino in the Camembert, the traffic circle in front of the Casino. Other super expensive cars were parked nearby.---

---Flower gardens and park in front of casino---
---One entrance to the famous Cafe de Paris, the most famous cafe in Monte-Carlo. We returned here Friday for the conference dinner!---
---The woman is a statue in the area next to the Cafe de Paris. Another casino door is seen to her left. There are 5 casinos in Monte-Carlo.---

---The outdoor part of the Cafe de Paris. The woman in black and the man are statues.---
---Wider angle view of outdoor cafe---
---Side street near the Camembert---
